hero.title: HEY, I'M SERHII KALIUZHNYI
hero.subtitle: A results-oriented Web Developer building and managing websites and web applications that lead to the overall product’s success.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: What you need to know about me
about.desc1: I am a Frontend Developer specializing in creating modern, responsive websites, landing pages, and online stores. I enjoy turning ideas and design mockups into live projects that work fast, look great on any device, and deliver real value to businesses.
about.desc2: I work confidently with HTML5, CSS3 (SCSS, Tailwind), JavaScript (ES6+), as well as with version control systems (Git) and project build and optimization tools (Webpack, Vite).
about.desc3: I also have experience integrating websites with CMS and e-commerce solutions.
about.desc52: – websites display correctly across all devices.
about.desc62: – pages load as quickly as possible.
about.desc72: – users enjoy smooth and intuitive interaction.
about.desc8: Currently, I am actively learning React and expanding my tech stack to work on more complex web applications.
about.desc9: I value teamwork, transparent communication, and responsibility for results. I am looking for opportunities to build projects that help people and support business growth.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.text1: I highly recommend working with Sergey. All tasks were completed efficiently and on time. He also made improvements to the code, SEO, and overall website performance.
testimonials.text2: I am very satisfied with the result! The main goal was achieved – clean code with WordPress integration.
testimonials.text3: Great work! The task was completed on time, all corrections and requests were implemented. Highly recommended.
testimonials.text4: Sergey did an excellent job. The project was completed with high quality and within the agreed timeframe. All feedback was implemented. I recommend hiring him.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I am always available. Feel free to contact me using any method convenient for you.
